entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 4 cm over southeastern sections. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
